feed.title: Md Omar Faruque
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: a post with TikZJax
entry.content: This is an example post with TikZ code. TikZJax converts script tags (containing TikZ code) into SVGs.
entry.summary: this is what included TikZ code could look like

entry.title: Jupyter Notebook

entry.title: Custom Blockquotes
entry.summary: <!– — layout: post title: a post with custom blockquotes date: 2023-05-12 15:53:00-0400 description: an example of a blog post with custom blockquotes tags: formatting blockquotes categories: sample-posts giscus_comments: true related_posts: true — This post shows how to add custom styles for blockquotes. Based on jekyll-gitbook implementation.

entry.title: Audios
entry.summary: <!– — layout: post title: a post with audios date: 2023-04-25 10:25:00 description: this is what included audios could look like tags: formatting audios categories: sample-posts — This is an example post with audios. It supports local audio files.

entry.title: Sidebar Table Of Contents
entry.summary: <!– — layout: post title: a post with table of contents on a sidebar date: 2023-04-25 10:14:00-0400 description: an example of a blog post with table of contents on a sidebar tags: formatting toc sidebar categories: sample-posts giscus_comments: true related_posts: false toc: sidebar: left — This post shows how to add a table of contents as a sidebar.

entry.title: Videos
entry.summary: <!– — layout: post title: a post with videos date: 2023-04-24 21:01:00 description: this is what included videos could look like tags: formatting videos categories: sample-posts — This is an example post with videos. It supports local video files.

entry.title: Tables

entry.title: Table Of Contents
entry.summary: <!– — layout: post title: a post with table of contents date: 2023-03-20 11:59:00-0400 description: an example of a blog post with table of contents tags: formatting toc categories: sample-posts giscus_comments: true related_posts: false toc: beginning: true — This post shows how to add a table of contents in the beginning of the post.
